Notes on $XLM  Bouncing along its Binance low (I know other exchanges have more history) but most trade on Binance so the low is of significance  Problem is Ive seen people try to buy this pattern 200 times the last 1-2 months, & everytime the coin just breaks down & makes an ATL

Prediction: When they finally go live, major institutions will bypass things like $ADA $XRP $LTC $XLM $ETH & go straight for the crap on the fringe exchanges 🙄  Smallcaps should have an experienced team & lots of backing to make it to the big leagues: $FTM & $RSR for example 🥇
